name: sword of light
description: A legendary sword imbued with the power of light, use to vanquish darkness and strike down foes with radiant energy.
short_description: A legendary sword imbued with the power of light.

name: Hand Axe
description: Commonly known as a hatchet, this smaller variety of axe is an everyday work tool.Despite its short reach, it is easy to handle.
short_description: A common work tool that is easy to handle.

name: Hand Ballista
description: An unconventional ballistic device modeled on a weapon used to besiege castles. Perfect for reckless acts.
short_description: An unconventional ballistic device perfect for reckless acts.

name: Backhand Blade
description: Curved blade wielded with a backhand grip. A type of weapon wielded by hornsent for generations.
short_description: A curved blade wielded with a backhand grip.

name: Beast claw
description: Weapon in the form of a carnivorous beast's vicious claws. Used to perform bestial slashing attacks uncanny to humankind.
short_description: A weapon in the form of a beast's claws.

name: Horn Bow
description: Longbow made from animal horn. Wielded by the master hunters of the ancestral followers.
short_description: A longbow made from animal horn.

name: Hookclaws
description: Weapon worn on the fist comprised of sharp parallel blades favored by those who lurk in the dark. Lacerations cause blood loss with great effect.
short_description: A weapon worn on the fist comprised of sharp parallel blades.

name: Royal Greatsword
description: Greatsword decorated in royal Carian Style. Favored weapon of Blaidd the Half-Wolf.
short_description: A greatsword decorated in royal Carian Style.

name: Anvil Hammer
description: One of the treasures of the ruined forges. A tremendous hammer that incorporates as its head the red-hot anvil of the forge.
short_description: A tremendous hammer that incorporates as its head the red-hot anvil of the forge.

name: Light Crossbow
description: Ranged weapon made from a bow fixed to a stock. Deals good damage and is simple to use, but requires reloading after firing.
short_description: A ranged weapon made from a bow fixed to a stock.

name: Dismounter
description: This curved greatsword wielded by the brawny sellswords of Kaiden combines the blades of a scimitar with the heft of a hatchet.
short_description: This curved greatsword combines the blades of a scimitar with the heft of a hatchet.

name: spirit sword
description: Sharp blade sculpted into a twisted shape. A sword that has seen many years of use in the gravesite.
short_description: A sharp blade sculpted into a twisted shape.

name: great knife
description: Large knife with a broad, curved blade. This weapon is designed to slash and rend.
short_description: A large knife with a broad, curved blade.

name: Golem fist
description: A giant fist of fractured rock. Taken from the body of a golem of the ruined forges.
short_description: A giant fist of fractured rock.

name: Nightrider Flail
description: A flail with two additional bludgeoning heads. Weapon of the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.
short_description: A flail with two additional bludgeoning heads.

name: Academy glinstone Staff
description: Staff of the Academy of Raya Lucaria, embedded with a turquoise glintstone.
short_description: A staff of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

name: Black steel greathammer
description: Greathammer of black steel with decorative embellishments in gold. Blessed with an Erdtree incantation.
short_description: A greathammer of black steel with decorative embellishments in gold.

name: Great katana
description: Large katana with a long, heavy blade. A weapon unique to warriors of the Land of Reeds.
short_description: A large katana with a long, heavy blade.

name: Lance
description: Considered a type of greatspear, this weapon has no blade, but instead features a long, conical body designed to pierce.
short_description: A weapon with no blade, designed to pierce.

name: Crescent moon axe
description: Greataxe with a large, arcing blade and long handle. The "Crescent Moon" of its name is said to have been spurred by nostalgia.
short_description: A greataxe with a large, arcing blade and long handle.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion
description: A medallion with crimson amber inlaid. Raises maximum HP.
short_description: A medallion that raises maximum HP.

name: Crimson seed talisman
description: A crimson-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed. Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears.
short_description: A talisman that boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears.

data.effect: Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears by 20%

name: Blessed Dew Talisman
description: Talisman depicting a drop of the Erdtree's sap, a blessed boon. Gradually restores HP.
short_description: A talisman that gradually restores HP.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion
description: A medallion with cerulean amber inlaid. Raises maximum FP.
short_description: A medallion that raises maximum FP.

name: Cerulean seed Talisman
description: A cerulean-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed. Boosts FP restoration from the Flask of Cerulean Tears.
short_description: A talisman that boosts FP restoration from the Flask of Cerulean Tears.

data.effect: Boosts FP restoration from the Flask of Cerulean Tears by 20%

name: Blessed blue dew Talisman
description: Talisman depicting the blessed boon that is a droplet of the blue, luminescent sap of the Erdtree. Gradually restores FP.
short_description: A talisman that gradually restores FP.

name: Talisman of Lords' Bestowal
description: A talisman depicting Godfrey, first Elden lord, receiving the precious sap. Increases poise after using a flask of tears.
short_description: A talisman that increases poise after using a flask of tears.

data.effect: Increases poise after using a flask of tears

name: Viridian Amber Medallion
description: A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. Raises maximum stamina.
short_description: A medallion that raises maximum stamina.

name: Green turtle Talisman
description: A talisman in the shape of a green turtle. Raises stamina recovery speed.
short_description: A talisman that raises stamina recovery speed.

name: Great-Jar's Arsenal
description: A charm that resembles a great jar overflowing with weaponry.Vastly boosts maximum equipment load.
short_description: A talisman that vastly boosts maximum equipment load.

data.effect: Vastly boosts maximum equipment load by 19%

name: Two-headed turtle Talisman
description: A talisman in the shape of a two-headed green turtle. Greatly raises stamina recovery speed.
short_description: A talisman that greatly raises stamina recovery speed.

data.effect: Greatly raises stamina recovery speed by 22.5%

name: Arsenal charm
description: An iron charm that resembles a mass of weaponry.Boosts maximum equipment load.
short_description: A talisman that boosts maximum equipment load.

name: Erdtree's Favor
description: A talisman depicting a special blessing of the Erdtree. Slightly raises maximum HP, stamina, and equip load.
short_description: A talisman that slightly raises maximum HP, stamina, and equip load.

data.effect: Raises maximum HP (3%), Stamina (7%), and Equip Load (5%)

name: Radagon's Scarseal
description: An eye engraved with an Elden Rune. Said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon.
short_description: A talisman said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon.

data.effect: Raises Vigor, Endurance, Strength, and Dexterity by 3, but increases damage taken by 10%

name: Radagon's Soreseal
description: This legendary talisman is an eye engraved with an Elden Rune, said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon.
short_description: A talisman said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon.

data.effect: Raises  Vigor,  Endurance,  Strength, and  Dexterity by 5 each, but increases damage taken by 15%

name: Ash of War: Dryleaf Whirlwind
description: It is a brand-new Ash of War in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. An ash of war that allows the user to perform a powerful whirlwind attack.
short_description: An ash of war that allows the user to perform a powerful whirlwind attack.

data.skill: Dryleaf Whirlwind: This skill represents the pinnacle of Dane's footwork-based martial artistry. Rise into the air with a series of spinning kicks before crashing down with one final strike. Imbues kicking attacks with energy, increasing their range.

name: Ash of War: aspects of the crucible: wings
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill: Aspects of the Crucible (Wings).
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Aspects of the Crucible (Wings).

data.skill: Aspects of the Crucible (Wings): This skill originates from the lifeforms of the Crucible. Grow a golden pair of wings and take to the air before diving down at the foe, weapon first. A spinning attack is performed when wielding a twinblade.

name: Ash of War: Spinning Gravity Thrust
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust.

data.skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust: A gravity skill honed by the disciples of an Alabaster Lord. Uses gravitational power to hang in the air before rotating the body and charging forward. An additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Ash of War: Palm Blast
description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill: Palm Blast.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Palm Blast.

data.skill: Palm Blast: Skill of the spiritual seekers known as the Dryleaf Sect. Imbues hand with energy before using a palm strike to unleash an explosive blast. The already formidable power and impact can be bolstered by charging the attack.

name: Ash of War: Piercing Throw
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Piercing Throw.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Piercing Throw.

data.skill: Piercing Throw: Throw armament with a powerful spin, causing it to bore through foes. When using this skill, the armament can be thrown further than normal and also pierce through enemies.

name: Ash of War: Scattershot Throw
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Scattershot Throw.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Scattershot Throw.

data.skill: Scattershot Throw: Employ smithing arts to conjure multiple copies of the armament in both hands and throw them all at once. Follow up with an additional input to throw again.

name: Ash of War: Raging Beast
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Raging Beast.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Raging Beast.

data.skill: Raging Beast: Step with the swiftness of a beast, leap high, and slash foe from above. Initial step can be taken forward, backward, left, or right. Strong attack allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Ash of War: Savage Claws
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Savage Claws.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Savage Claws.

data.skill: Savage Claws: Pounce like a beast to viciously slash into foe with left and right claws.

name: Ash of War: Swift Slash
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Swift Slash.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Swift Slash.

data.skill: Swift Slash: A skill passed down amongst hornsent swordsmen. Take a swift forward step to slice through foes. This sharp strike also fires off a shearing vacuum. Can be charged to increase the skill's power and the distance of the forward step.

name: Ash of War: Overhead Stance
description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill: Overhead Stance.
short_description: This Ash of War grants the skill: Overhead Stance.

data.skill: Overhead Stance: A skill that starts with the blade held high in a ready stance. Execute a normal attack from this stance to step forward and slash downwards, or a strong attack to deliver a series of downward slashes.
